gov.usgs.anss.seed

Class Blockette1000

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.seed.Blockette1000

  • public class Blockette1000
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Blockette 1000 from the SEED standard V2.4 Blockette1000.java * The blockette 1000 has : 0 i*2 blockette type is 1000 2 i*2 Next Blockette byte number (offset to next blockette) 4 Encoding format - 10 = steimI, 11=steim2, 5 word order 0 little endian, 1=big endian 6 record length power (2^b(6) = length) 7 reserved
